snippet.title: Bad Credit? No Problem! | Official Launch Trailer | Pre-order Now on iOS & Android
snippet.description:
Dive into the chaotic and hilarious world of “Bad Credit? No Problem!”—now available on iOS and Android! 🎉

In this thrilling indie game, step into the shoes of a title loan agent at Title 4 Cash and navigate the wild world of loan processing. With dark humor, pixel art graphics, and engaging gameplay, you’ll review loan applications, interact with quirky characters, and face intense challenges.

🚀 Features:

 • Story Mode: Survive the 14-day probation period
 • Survival Mode: Endless challenge with increasing difficulty
 • Special Event: “Fright Night Files” Halloween extravaganza
 • Immersive office sounds and captivating storyline

💬 Join the Conversation:
#IndieDevs #MobileGaming #IndieGaming #PixelArt #GameDev #MobileGames #IndieGameDev #GameLaunch #NewGame #AndroidGaming #iOSGaming
